about_the_game:
Set in a post-apocalyptic world teeming with mysterious creatures, Chronomon combines monster taming and farm sims for a single, seamless experience. Catch them, train them, evolve them - then take the fight to the Epoch Syndicate, while uniting towns through trade, non-linear quests, and, of course, defeating the villains that threaten everyone. Don't forget to take care of yourself: Hearty meals and plenty of sleep matter as much as chronomon in the vibrant, ever-changing world that's yours to explore!

Want to share the experience? Play anywhere thanks to cross-save support for all devices, including smartwatches (Android WearOS 2.0 and up), or play together with friends - building robust trade networks or challenging each other in chronomon battles!

Tame a Hundred Monsters

  • Catch over 100 monsters (in both regular and rare varieties with unique traits), who will fight for you, explore for you, work the farm for you - and more!

  • Train each monster to tweak and tailor them to fit your playstyle, thanks to a robust RPG system: 39 skill trees and over 300 distinct skills, upgraded further by scoring Perfect Hits in combat, monster Imprints, and special passives!

  • Solve puzzles with the chronomon, using their unique abilities to overcome challenges scattered across the map and unlock special treasures!

  • Put them to work on the farm, rebuilding it from scratch and gaining special rewards!

Farm after the Apocalypse

  • Plant and cultivate over 50 distinct types of crops, then turn them into a variety of meals to keep yourself alive and your chronomon in fighting shape. Then trade the surplus with nearby towns for essential goods.

  • Head out into the world to gather raw materials for the farm and take a break while fishing, with a chance to catch over 20 types of fish (and then cook or sell them).

  • Use your chronomon to maximize production on the farm, using their unique abilities to turn it into the agricultural heart of the world.

  • Customize and decorate the farm to your liking, making it a spot of joy and hope in an apocalyptic world.

Restore the World

  • Head into town to undertake quests to rebuild them and forge lasting friendships. Each playthrough is unique, thanks to branching storylines and choices that matter!

  • Adventure across a dynamic world, changing with the time of day. Head out at dawn for casual, mostly safe exploration - or strike out at dusk on risky expeditions with high rewards.

  • Experience a dynamic weather system, with drizzling rains, freezing blizzards, and other natural disasters that directly affect chronomon battles and your farming efforts.

  • Free the world from the oppressive Epoch Syndicate, seeking to conquer the survivors of the apocalypse for its own, nefarious ends!

short_description: Chronomon is a fresh take on the Monster Taming and Farming genre. Catch, train, and evolve unique creatures while rebuilding a world in ruins. Befriend villagers, engage in strategic battles, and grow your farm—all with cross-saves on every device, including smartwatches.
